DOC.brief_summary: Background : Kinesiotaping ( KT ) elastic therapeutic tape develop 70 's Dr Kenso Kase prevention treatment sport injury . Research show activation skin receptor KT improve blood lymph flow , increase proprioception , help relieve pain , facilitate joint muscle alignment , enhances muscle function . Despite increase popularity KT , uncertainty remain regard , particular , effectiveness improve strength . Purpose : The purpose current study investigate short-term effect KT muscle strength apply quadriceps muscle healthy subject . Methods : A randomized control trial 52 healthy subject conduct . Subjects test four different condition : ) facilitate Kinesiotape , b ) inhibiting Kinesiotape , c ) classical tape elastic property , ) no-taping across four different session . The parameter interest : quadriceps hamstring maximal strength power use vertical jump test ( squat jump countermovement jump ) , peak concentric eccentric knee torque ( use isokinetic test protocol ) .
DOC.brief_title: Effects Kinesiotape Quadriceps Hamstring Muscle Strength
DOC.criteria: least 18 year age allow perform jumps pregnancy history cardiovascular disease antecedent low extremity injury use dope substance list World Antidoping Agency contraindication exercise
